name: Magicube
description:
A magical puzzle platformer with 50 thinky levels.
No jumps without thinking.

Option settings conform to specifications of PICO-8.

  • Sound : on / off
  • Window / Fullscreen
  • Controls (no reassignment)

    Move : [arrowkeys L / R]
    Jump : [Z]
    Chant : [X] (with arrowkeys to cast)
    Undo : [arrowkey down]
    Restart : [hold arrowkey up]
    Menu : [Enter]
